---
title: "Tools & Resources"
subtitle: "Procurement Intelligence & Supplier Management"
---

<style>
.tools-container {
  max-width: 1000px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.tool-section {
  padding: 3rem 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e5e5;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .tool-section {
  border-bottom-color: #333;
}

.tool-section:last-child {
  border-bottom: none;
}

.tool-section h2 {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
  color: #1a1a1a;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .tool-section h2 {
  color: #f5f5f5;
}

.tool-description {
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.7;
  color: #4a4a4a;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .tool-description {
  color: #d0d0d0;
}

/* Cost Calculator */
.calculator-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .calculator-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.calc-input-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.calc-input-group label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #333;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .calc-input-group label {
  color: #ddd;
}

.calc-input-group input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .calc-input-group input {
  background: #2a2a2a;
  color: #fff;
  border-color: #444;
}

.calc-input-group input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #2980b9;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(41, 128, 185, 0.1);
}

.calc-input-group small {
  display: block;
  margin-top: 0.3rem;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #888;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .calc-input-group small {
  color: #999;
}

.calculator-results {
  background: #f5f5f5;
  padding: 2rem;
  border-radius: 6px;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .calculator-results {
  background: #1e1e1e;
}

.result-item {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  padding-bottom: 1.5rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .result-item {
  border-bottom-color: #333;
}

.result-item:last-child {
  border-bottom: none;
}

.result-label {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #888;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.5px;
  margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .result-label {
  color: #aaa;
}

.result-value {
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2980b9;
}

.calculator-button {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 0.75rem 2rem;
  background: #2980b9;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.calculator-button:hover {
  background: #1f5fa6;
}

/* Chatbot */
.chatbot-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .chatbot-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.chatbot-box {
  background: #f5f5f5;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  height: 500px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .chatbot-box {
  background: #2a2a2a;
  border-color: #444;
}

.chat-messages {
  flex: 1;
  overflow-y: auto;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.chat-message {
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  border-radius: 6px;
  max-width: 90%;
  word-wrap: break-word;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  line-height: 1.5;
}

.chat-message.user {
  align-self: flex-end;
  background: #2980b9;
  color: white;
}

.chat-message.ai {
  align-self: flex-start;
  background: #e8e8e8;
  color: #333;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .chat-message.ai {
  background: #3a3a3a;
  color: #ddd;
}

.chat-input-area {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.chat-input-area input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

[data-bs-theme="dark"] .chat-input-area input {
  background: #1a1a1a;
  color: #fff;
  border-color: #444;
}

.chat-input-area button {
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  background: #2980b9;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.chat-input-area button:hover {
  background: #1f5fa6;
}
